titles.title: A bill to exempt a foreign holding company from the application of the provisions of the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9566-9567)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 7/22/1994--Introduced. Declares that the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 shall not apply to a specified foreign (Canadian) holding company solely as a result of its acquisition of all the voting securities of a gas utility company that: (1) is organized and operating under Vermont law; and (2) has its service territory contiguous to the gas utility operations of the holding company.
